titles.title: To restore the integrity of the Fifth Amendment to the Constitution of the United States, and for other purposes.
To restore the integrity of the Fifth Amendment to the Constitution of the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, Ways and Means, and Financial Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
